title: Command and Compliance
description: Next in line to the Alpha position, Corey hides his submissive nature from his family and clan. After abusing both werewolves and his slave boys, Kailum, owner of Southport's BDSM clubs, is both hated and feared. Love brings the young werewolf and harsh dominant together but will it be enough to keep them alive?
author: Tadgh Faolan
